```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(USAboundaries)
library(mappingelections)

map_id <- "meae.congressional.congress14.ct.county"
```

<div class="map">

```{r election-map, echo = FALSE}
map_id %>%
  get_county_map_data() %>%
  map_counties(height = "350px", congress = 14)
```

</div>

Connecticut elected seven Federalists to the Fourteenth Congress.

Mapping this election is not possible because of the lack of returns at the town or county level.

Connecticut used a statewide at-large system for electing members to Congress.

<div class="results-table">

```{r election-results, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
map_id %>%
  candidate_results() %>%
  results_to_table() %>%
  cat()
```

</div>
